column2:
"If ARKS faces a strong opponent,
you want to try to fight them, right?"
"Well, a cook is the same. If there is a really delicious ingredient, it's natural that we'd want to cook it."

"I'm telling you my insights as a cook.
Pendran tail meat is supposed
to be really delicious."

"So I beg you!
I want you to gather some ingredients for me!"
